message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start to the game!
I think a 60-40 split in my favor is more fair, considering the potential for inflation.
I don't think a 60-40 split in your favor is fair, considering the initial proposal was 60-40 in my favor. I'd like to make a new offer.
A 55-45 split seems reasonable, considering the inflation. Let's try this!
